Create three white 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens, then roll a d6.
[b]1-2 [/b]| Put a vigilance counter on up to three target Warrior creatures you control.
[b]3-4 [/b]| Put a first strike counter on up to three target Warrior creatures you control.
[b]5-6 [/b]| Put a lifelink counter on up to three target Warrior creatures you control.
